name: The Gallery (LiminalNotion)
description:
The Gallery

This project was created to house the artwork and other things that my children create. It also houses a small collection of artwork by myself and wife. It also serves as my final submission for the Unity 'Creative Core' Pathway, demonstrating:

  • Baked and Realtime Lighting
  • VFX
  • Animation
  • Diegetic and Non-Diegetic Audio
  • Post Processing
  • UI and Artwork ID system to show Name and Artist

The Courtyard

Wing #1

Wing #2

Some More Artwork

Usage and Installation

  1. Unzip 'TheGallery.zip' to desired location and run 'The Gallery.exe' from within the new folder.
  2. Explore the artwork, or just take in the sight and sound of the fountain.
  3. You definitely cannot fly cardboard boxes (seriously, don't even try.)

Controls

  • ESC to open Menu
  • WASD to move
  • MOUSE to look
  • RMB to zoom
  • SPACE to jump
  • L CTRL to crouch
  • L SHIFT to walk briskly
